Description: First floor two bedroom featuring a private entrance, in-unit washer/dryer, yard area, modern kitchen and bathroom. Steps to Star Market supermarket, Rite Aid and Marshall stores. It is also only a three-block walk to the new Lechmere Green Line T station which takes you straight into Boston. You can visit the dog park next door or run/walk the Charles River from this apartment. Great bike storage. Private basement good for storage or projects with good lighting and new cement floor. The apartment layout has bedrooms on opposite sides of the space with an open floor plan kitchen/living room in between. Easy to show. Owner wants good credit, good references and two months rent to start (first months rent and security deposit).
